channel.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
channel.description:
Hello, I'm wondering if there is a tutorial or snippet of code on how to get a weapon into a 2H state, Namely my Armadyl God sword, i have coded everything for it (Except from stances) and i would like to know how to make it 2H, since right now its able to be used with a shield :rolleyes:
Im new to the forums and have read the rules, i have used the search bar but with no avail :( Any responses appreciated.
Kieron532

item.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Wow man, genius! thanks so much for your answer, and thanks to all the guys who attempted to help me!

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

its staying in the correct slot, you could’ve made it clearer…
open up client.java and search:

int[] two_hand = {

this is what you should see:

int[] two_hand = { 841, 843, 849, 853, 857, 861, 1319, 2745, 2746, 2747, 2748, 4153, 4214, 4215, 4216, 4217, 4218, 4219, 4220, 4221, 4222, 4223, 4710, 4718, 4726, 4734, 4747, 4755, 6528, 7158, 9109, 9106, 9100, 9104, 9107, 9103, 9102, 7603, 7630, 1307, 1309, 1311, 1313, 1315, 1317, 1319 }; for (int a = 0; a < two_hand.length; a++) {
EXAMPLE!! see all those ids? the item id: 2745 is a bandos GS (my id)

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

The D2H works perfectly, its held like a 2H, stats fully working and in the weapon slot, heck even the special attack works
As for the row of code:
{ 1319, 1, 99, 3, 1090, 1088 },
1319 being the 2H id

(As i said im using Devolution 2.8 server base)

Read full topic

item.description:

well, whatever weapon is wielded in 2H stance, search for it in your item.java, then add the ags id to it.
also, what base are you using?

item.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Forgive me for being a total Nubcake…but im not sure which code of the item is a stance, here is one code of a 2H sword:
item = 7158 Dragon_2h_sword A_two-handed_dragon_sword. 20000 20000 20000 -4 92 80 -4 0 0 0 0 0 -1 93 0

I’m not sure what code is a stance?

Thanks for the awesome quick reply though!
Im using Devolution 2.8 server if anyone is wondering (If its delta…YES im aware Delta sucks)

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Do you have an Item.cfg or Java? ( I think that it’s this name )

(You should find rows of different types of stances from armour to weapons, and many different codes together after the type of stance)

If so try finding the code for the 2H weapon, in this case the armadyl godsword and putting it under the row with all the other 2handed weapons.

Item ID for Armadyl GS is 11694

Read full topic

item.title: Making a Weapon 2H?[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

To make it a 2h go to item.java.

Scroll down till you find 2h’s

Add the Ags item id to the end of the list( I think ags is 35)

-Will

Read full topic
